item.title: Komal add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "I, um, I have this problem. I broke up with my boyfriend, you see. And I'm pretty upset about it, so I wanted to talk to my best friend. [...] The thing is, they're both you." -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: Komal add a quote by Nyrae Dawn
item.description: "It's amazing how good it feels to talk about him. How I realize that even though we're over, what we had was true. You can't fake that. I still love him and I really believe he loved me, too." -- Nyrae Dawn

item.title: Komal add a quote by Arundhati Roy
item.description: "That's what careless words do. They make people love you a little less." -- Arundhati Roy

item.title: Komal add a quote by Arundhati Roy
item.description: "If you're happy in a dream, does that count?" -- Arundhati Roy

item.title: Komal add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "Love is not a because, it's a no matter what." -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: Komal add a quote by George Eliot
item.description: "It is never too late to be what you might have been." -- George Eliot

item.title: Komal add a quote by Audrey Niffenegger
item.description: "Don't you think it's better to be extremely happy for a short while, even if you lose it, than to be just okay for your whole life?" -- Audrey Niffenegger

item.title: Komal add a quote by Audrey Niffenegger
item.description: "Time is priceless, but it’s Free. You can't own it, you can use it. You can spend it. But you can't keep it. Once you've lost it you can never get it back." -- Audrey Niffenegger

item.title: Komal add a quote by Audrey Niffenegger
item.description: "Do you ever miss him? Every day. Every minute. Every minute, she says. Yes, it's that way, isn't it?" -- Audrey Niffenegger

item.title: Komal add a quote by Audrey Niffenegger
item.description: "When you live with a woman you learn something every day. So far I have learned that long hair will clog up the shower drain befor you can say "Liquid-Plumr"; that it is not advisable to clip something out of the newspaper before your wife has read it, even if the newspaper in question is a week old; that I am the only person in our two-person household who can eat the same thing for dinner three nights in a row without pouting; and that headphones were invented to preserve spouses from each other's musical excesses." -- Audrey Niffenegger

item.title: Komal add a quote by Orhan Pamuk
item.description: "Most of the time it's not the Europeans who belittle us. What happens when we look at them is that we belittle ourselves. When we undertake the pilgrimage, it's not just to escape the tyranny at home but also to reach to the depths of our souls. The day arrives when the guilty must return to save those who could not find the courage to leave." -- Orhan Pamuk

item.title: Komal add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "Nothing that’s worthwhile is ever easy. Remember that." -- Nicholas Sparks
